column1: #Text=Tenzin says : " I know that none of you chose to become airbenders .
#Text=" Other airbender # 2 says : " Count me in .
#Text=" Korra says : " Good luck at the Northern Air Temple .
#Text=I 'll send more airbenders your way when I find them .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Be careful out there .
#Text=Seems like wherever I go , I make a new enemy .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " But you made some new friends too .
#Text=" Korra says : " This is only the beginning .
